description.--scan-type: Scan types: Validate, light_scan, scan    Validate=validates if subdomain exists light_scan=service detection      scan=all of the mentioned + bruteforce
description.--dns-threads: The amount of threads that will validate subdomains (default=10)
description.--web-threads: The amount of threads that will be requesting files in the http discovery phase (works only with scan scan_type) (Default:40)
